TopicTitle: Fanwork Friday: A mug you can trust

Articles.Content: What better way to enjoy your coffee than this? Carl sent us a picture of a mug he made, get it? Mug? Oh you..
Jebs mug shot I am Punny

> 
> .. get it? Mug? Oh you..

That was either a really bad joke or I don't get it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> That was either a really bad joke or I don't get it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

A "mug" can be defined as a person's face as well...i.e. "Look at that guys ugly mug" {points to ugly dude's face}

[https://www.google.com/search?q=mug+definition](https://www.google.com/search?q=mug+definition)

![giphy.gif](http://media3.giphy.com/media/e3C4pNKkr9rji/giphy.gif)

and i mean it. if it was forsale for a fair price, i would take it.
